newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-ASX substantial shareholding notices - Feb 19.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-ASX substantial shareholding notices - Feb 19.

text.p: The following substantial shareholder notices have been made to The Australian Stock Exchange (ASX).

Kerry Matthew Stokes and all of the Companies listed in Annexure A increased its relevant interest in Seven Network Limited on 17/02/1997, from 64,028,442 ordinary shares (21.98%) to 70,350,346 ordinary shares (24.085%).
Templeton Worldwide Inc. increased its relevant interest in Gio Australia Holdings Limited from 50,170,320 ordinary shares (8.44%) to 57,454,915 ordinary shares (9.46%).
